Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Hello, I need help with tracking link to the landing page

Hi there! I'd be happy to help you with setting up event tracking for your landing page. Could you please let me know which tracking platform or service you're using? This will help me provide you with the most accurate instructions.

https://pages.revivalpoint.com/vsl/urgecontrol?a=2722&utm_medium=paid&utm_source=newsbreak&utm_campaign={{campaign.name}}&utm_content={{ad.name}}?newsbreak_cid=__CALLBACK_PARAM__ this is the link setup corrently

Thanks for sharing the link! It looks like you're using NewsBreak macros in your URL. To ensure everything is set up correctly, make sure that the `__CALLBACK_PARAM__` is properly inserted into your landing page URL to track events effectively. If you need more detailed guidance on integrating a general NewsBreak Postback, you can refer to this [article](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback). Let me know if there's anything else you need help with!
